pages.text: This spell will summon entangling roots upon a target. If the roots managed to catch a target in time, they will be unable to move until the roots retreat back into the ground. When cast with $(l:crafts/wild_staff)Wild Staff$(), the roots will be summoned underneath 8 nearby non-allied creatures.
Wearing a $(l:crafts/garment/wild_robe)Wild Robe$(), will cause the roots to continuously damage the entrapped target.
